channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache Solr
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache Solr

item.title: CVE-2019-0193|2024-08-04T17:44:14.809Z -- apache -- apache%20solr
item.description: In Apache Solr, the DataImportHandler, an optional but popular module to pull in data from databases and other sources, has a feature in which the whole DIH configuration can come from a request's "dataConfig" parameter. The debug mode of the DIH admin screen uses this to allow convenient debugging / development of a DIH config. Since a DIH config can contain scripts, this parameter is a security risk. Starting with version 8.2.0 of Solr, use of this parameter requires setting the Java System property "enable.dih.dataConfigParam" to true.
